languages.text: "Сосуществование в одном секторе с проклятыми ксеносами невозможно! Надеюсь, за их рейдом на Даргонус последует наш ответный карательный поход!" {n}Молодой Зауэрбэк самодовольно и кровожадно улыбается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Сосуществование в одном секторе с проклятыми ксеносами невозможно! Надеюсь, за их рейдом на Даргонус последует наш ответный карательный поход!" {n}Молодой Зауэрбэк самодовольно и кровожадно улыбается.{/n}

languages.text: "Sharing the sector with the blasted xenos is impossible! I hope we respond to their raid on Dargonus with a punitive campaign!" {n}Young Sauerback's smile is conceited and bloodthirsty.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сосуществование в одном секторе с проклятыми ксеносами невозможно! Надеюсь, за их рейдом на Даргонус последует наш ответный карательный поход!" {n}Молодой Зауэрбэк самодовольно и кровожадно улыбается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sharing the sector with the blasted xenos is impossible! I hope that their raid on Dargonus is retorted with a punitive campaign!" {n}Young Sauerback's smile is conceited and bloodthirsty.{/n}
"Sharing the sector with the blasted xenos is impossible! I hope that their raid on Dargonus is retorted with a punitive campaign!" {n}Young Sauerback's smile is conceited and bloodthirsty.{/n}
"Sharing the sector with the blasted xenos is impossible! I hope we respond to their raid on Dargonus with a punitive campaign!" {n}Young Sauerback's smile is conceited and bloodthirsty.{/n}
"Sharing the sector with the blasted xenos is impossible! I hope we respond to their raid on Dargonus with a punitive campaign!" {n}Young Sauerback's smile is conceited and bloodthirsty.{/n}
"Sharing the sector with the blasted xenos is impossible! I hope we respond to their raid on Dargonus with a punitive campaign!" {n}Young Sauerback's smile is conceited and bloodthirsty.{/n}

languages.text: 「目障りな異種族と同じ区域に住むなんて無理です！ダルゴナスへの襲撃には報復作戦で応えてやりましょう！」{n}ヤング・ザウアーバックの微笑みにはうぬぼれと残虐さがにじむ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sharing the sector with the blasted xenos is impossible! I hope we respond to their raid on Dargonus with a punitive campaign!" {n}Young Sauerback's smile is conceited and bloodthirsty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「目障りな異種族と同じ区域に住むなんて無理です！ダルゴナスへの襲撃には報復作戦で応えてやりましょう！」{n}ヤング・ザウアーバックの微笑みにはうぬぼれと残虐さがにじむ。{/n}

languages.text: “我们和那些该死的异形不共戴天！我希望我们能进行报复，以此回应他们对达戈努斯的袭击！”{n}年轻的苏尔贝克露出了自负而嗜血的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sharing the sector with the blasted xenos is impossible! I hope we respond to their raid on Dargonus with a punitive campaign!" {n}Young Sauerback's smile is conceited and bloodthirsty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们和那些该死的异形不共戴天！我希望我们能进行报复，以此回应他们对达戈努斯的袭击！”{n}年轻的苏尔贝克露出了自负而嗜血的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Compartir el sector con los malditos xenos es impensable! ¡Espero que respondamos a su incursión contra Dargonus con una campaña de castigo!». {n}La sonrisa del joven Sauerback es arrogante y sanguinaria.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sharing the sector with the blasted xenos is impossible! I hope we respond to their raid on Dargonus with a punitive campaign!" {n}Young Sauerback's smile is conceited and bloodthirsty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Compartir el sector con los malditos xenos es impensable! ¡Espero que respondamos a su incursión contra Dargonus con una campaña de castigo!». {n}La sonrisa del joven Sauerback es arrogante y sanguinaria.{/n}

languages.text: « Nous ne pouvons pas laisser ces maudits xénos arpenter librement le secteur ! J'espère que nous répondrons à leur raid sur Dargonus par une expédition punitive ! » {n}s'exclame le jeune Sauerback avec arrogance, un rictus sanguinaire aux lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sharing the sector with the blasted xenos is impossible! I hope we respond to their raid on Dargonus with a punitive campaign!" {n}Young Sauerback's smile is conceited and bloodthirsty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne pouvons pas laisser ces maudits xénos arpenter librement le secteur ! J'espère que nous répondrons à leur raid sur Dargonus par une expédition punitive ! » {n}s'exclame le jeune Sauerback avec arrogance, un rictus sanguinaire aux lèvres.{/n}

languages.text: "Den Sektor mit den verdammten Xenos zu teilen, ist nicht hinnehmbar! Ich hoffe, wir reagieren auf ihren Angriff auf Dargonus mit einem Straffeldzug!" {n}Das Lächeln des jungen Sauerback ist eitel und blutrünstig.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sharing the sector with the blasted xenos is impossible! I hope we respond to their raid on Dargonus with a punitive campaign!" {n}Young Sauerback's smile is conceited and bloodthirsty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Den Sektor mit den verdammten Xenos zu teilen, ist nicht hinnehmbar! Ich hoffe, wir reagieren auf ihren Angriff auf Dargonus mit einem Straffeldzug!" {n}Das Lächeln des jungen Sauerback ist eitel und blutrünstig.{/n}

languages.text: "Kahrolası zenolarla aynı sektörde yaşamak olacak iş değil! Umarım Dargonus'a yaptıkları baskının bedelini misliyle ödetiriz!" {n}Genç Sauerback'in gülümsemesinden, kendini beğenmiş ve kana susamış olduğu belli oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sharing the sector with the blasted xenos is impossible! I hope we respond to their raid on Dargonus with a punitive campaign!" {n}Young Sauerback's smile is conceited and bloodthirsty.{/n}
